website_summaries.verdict: This pillow is perfect for your newborn and can be used while they're sleeping or in a bouncer or stroller.
pros: Fits easily into a bouncer or stroller
Round cutout keeps baby's neck supported while relieving pressure on the scalp
Helps keep your baby's head straight
cons: This pillow is too small to be used on infants older than 4 months

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for flat head
customer_reviews.text: This picture speaks volumes, I used this pillow o2n combo with one other pillow but used the boppy noggin primarily. These results are one month apart. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy any supportive pillow, because i didn’t think it would actually work. However this pillow has! The picture on the left is after about a week of use, and the picture of the left was my daughters head before. She doesn’t go to sleep without it, and it really does make a difference. The proof is in the picture. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tevin Heath

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the product details because this is small for 0-4 months. Other than that, it's worked great. My son is in physical therapy for a tight neck and slight flat spot. The therapist thought it was very beneficial, and wanted to know where we got it. Mamas this is a must have, whether little one has a flat spot problem or not.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset I went without this product for 4 whole months! My little one was developing quite the flat spot on the back of her head. After much research, I purchased this product with little hope that it would help but I was pleasantly surprised at how much this had helped after only a month of use! I would definitely recommend to on-the-go parents. If nothing else, it doesn’t make it any worse and provides more peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this product as I had to take out my ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product as I had to take out my infant insert in my carseat. The cushion for the head was great but it was super thick that it made my baby's head fall forward when he was sleeping or when my husband would break in the car. Maybe it just wasnt right for my carseat. It would have worked really well in a stroller at a more reclined position!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for flat spot!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 2 weeks ago and started using it on my baby right away. She is 12 weeks old now and I've noticed a HUGE improvement on her flat spot in just days of using it. I only use it at night time, although I could throughout the day but I don't. I will recommend this pillow to anyone with babies!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing I've bought for my baby! It's more than just for flat spots (initially why I purchased) She is 5 and a half weeks old and on our walk she got to sit up in her stroller because of the great head support. Also great for carseats and swings. The newborn head rests included are pretty much useless. I wish I had this 5 and a half weeks ago. Will be a gift I give for every shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Made my Sons head mishaped, buy a different pillow
customer_reviews.text: Used for a few months in my sons rock n play. Fit well and everything, but after 2 months of using nightly my son developed a odd circle indent on his head. We stopped using right away and purchased a different pillow for flat head.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Flat head no more!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had torticollis and as a result developed a flat spot. We purchased this and used it in her carseat, swing, bouncer etc. It prevented us having to buy and helmet. We ordered this when we found out we were having another baby as a preventative measure and love it all over again. I think babies find it snug and comforting and it helps support the head without pressure points. I recommend this to all new moms and dads!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Park Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Rock n Play
customer_reviews.text: My 5 week old developed a flat spot from sleeping soundly in his Rock n Play so we bought this pillow, and the other Boppy head support pillow, to try to round out this head. I did not like the other Boppy pillow because it pushed his chin to his chest, but this Noggin Nest pillow kept it well supported. I used it in his Rock n Play and swing, and noticed a difference within just 2 weeks. His flat spot is almost completely gone now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It works to reshape baby’s head
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this with my 10 week old and saw improvements with his flat spot within a week. Like many reviewers I also added much more tummy time and reduced the amount of time spent on back during the day too. I liked it so much I bought another one so I can have one in his bassinet and one for his play mat/changing area. My favorite part is the attached flap to go under baby’s back so the pillow doesn’t shift when they move their head. It is essential for safety so the pillow doesn’t wind up covering the baby’s face. I wish I had this for my first born.
customer_reviews.author: CK1

customer_reviews.title: No helmet needed!
customer_reviews.text: My baby’s head was so flat. I laid him down way too much without realizing, I was just excited to have a baby that didn’t want to be held. I got this, put him on it at all times his head was touching something. Doctor said at 3 months we may need to look into a helmet. At 5 months it’s not even a question. 10/10!!! Thank goodness for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great prevention!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these, one for the house, one for the car seat. Our last child slept in a rock n play, which flattened one side of her head. She had to wear a doc band (baby helmet) for four months, during the summer (man did that thing smell). Not to mention the doc band cost $3,000. Needless to say, we decided with this baby we were going to do everything we could to keep her head nice and round. Happy to say it’s as round as a cue ball. Trust me, whatever this costs, it’s possibly saving you thousands.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDavis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect/ no flat head!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the stroller, in the car, and i even used them in the baby swing. I started using this product when the twins were new born. I still use it and they are 1! It’s washable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey hansen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for flatheads!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product more stars I would!!!! I’m so thankful to have come across this product! My son had a horrible flat head! And was close to getting a helmet. I bought this and it got his head 100% back to its normal shape!!!! I used it in his bouncy seat, and rock and sleep!! He slept in his rock and sleep at night because of reflux so I’d put it in there for the night!! It really worked!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi McClung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Rock n Play baby
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, our baby slept in a rock n play and I worried about baby getting a flat head. I noticed a small flat spot developing and quickly purchased one of these. She is now transitioned out of the rock n play but I definitely attribute her nice round head to this product. Great quality, love that I could just throw it in the washer if it got soiled. Now we use it in her car seat since she doesn't need it in the rock n play anymore. It helps keep her head from falling to the side when she naps in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Troy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow for a few days when I started noticing a ridge on the back of my babies head. After about a week I realized the ridge was exactly the same shape as the center of the noggin nest pillow. Instead of preventing flat spots this pillow was actually causing the head to misshapen. Would not recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mcm13

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended tto me that I use this in my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended tto me that I use this in my daughters rock n play to prevent flat spots, but it forces her head forward too much and her chin ends up on her chest. Good concept but doesn’t pan out.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Reilly

customer_reviews.title: More Flat head
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure about the good reviews but im sure about my experience and that a proof to me , i bought 2 of this so i can wash one while i use the other one i have used for my son for 1 month now all the time because he has a flat side in his head and now all back area are flat!!!! And my son is just 2 months old. Trust the bad reviews because that is the honest people
customer_reviews.author: Fatema

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I found this one on a blog actually RIGHT after I ordered a different one. I canceled that order and got this one instead. I’m so glad I did! I love that it has the short pad connected to the headrest, along with the slits (with Velcro to hold it) for shoulder straps. This helps it stay in place. We use it in our stroller, car seat, swing, and on the floor. It’s easy to move from one to the other and works good in all places. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not good
customer_reviews.text: Better than nothing with SUPERVISED use on the playmat (it’s not actually intended for use on a flat surface, but we keep an eye out during use) Not the best for babies under 4 months - it’s a little bulky for them and pushes their face forward. I’m sure it’s helpful in keeping a round head, and it’s helped a little with our baby’s flat head, but with constant use it will definitely leave a circular bulge on the back of a flat head. Quality material though.
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend this product! Our baby was practically living in her swing due to terrible reflux, and she was developing a very prominent flat spot on the back of her head from laying in one position all the time. I bought this about a month ago and her flat spot is gone now. Our baby is now 4.5 months old and has move to the crib with a wedge and is still using this noggin - it helps keep her in the right place all night (instead of scooting to the bottom of the wedge) which means her reflux is kept at bay and she's still not getting that flat spot. Just can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jbugadoodle07

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job, stop using for naps once they start turning
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Boppy noggin nest over 3 kids in 6.5 years, so you can tell I like this product. The littlest is not here yet, but his two older siblings have beautiful, unflattened heads. We used this in our baby swing, rock n play sleeper, car seat, etc. with proper supervision, and never had a problem with the kids being too hunched over or uncomfortable or anything. Once each of them started turning on their own we stopped using for naps. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miffyspike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and gives good head support
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my baby not have an absolutely flat head since she favored sleeping on her back all the time. I would have given it 5 stars if it was made of cotton. Other than that, it’s very good quality and is very easy to clean (washer and dryer). We’ve been using it for a little over 4 months now. I would recommend using it at younger ages coz the hole gets a tiny bit small as your baby’s head grows.
customer_reviews.author: Abby_AZ_15

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 week old baby had a couple of flat spots on her head, and after just a day of using this pillow in conjunction with tummy time and holding her, they have definitely gotten better and I almost can't feel them. We put this in carriers and seats and let her sleep in her crib with it (it doesn't prevent the baby from being able to move her head). I think this definitely helps relieve flat spots. The material is also soft and pillow is machine washable which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus J.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and helps with flat head
customer_reviews.text: I nocticed a difference in my 3 month olds flat spot within 2 weeks of using this pillow. It’s big, I don’t know why other reviews state that babies out grown this quickly. My baby has a really big head, and now at 4 months this fits him really well, with room to grow. I use it in the stroller, our swing, and any time I lay him on a flat surface. It’s worked great for us and helped with head shape even without using it at night in the crib (I don’t do that). Seems comfortable because my son doesn’t mind being on it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one twin not for the other.
customer_reviews.text: I have twins and both were born very squished. Started using this pillow because they both are flat on the left side. My one baby also has torticollis, it does not seem to be helping her flat if anything it’s making it worse. However my other baby it has helped! I think per all things baby, every baby is different. Different shaped heads, different sleeping habits etc. For the price and convenience I do recommend at least giving it a go. The product itself is well made, cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Matson

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had got it from birth on!
customer_reviews.text: Moms and dads out there, get a baby pillow from birth on! Don't wait too long like what we did :(. Probably doesn't even matter which brand/type, just get a pillow to prevent or help correct a flat spot on baby's head! This product works pretty well, even though we wish the cover fabric were 100% cotton -- Boppy used to make a cotton version that we had for our first child, but now there is only this poly/cotton blend version. I would say it's a bit warm due to fabric especially in warm temperature. Overall still pretty good though.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Like many moms, I was concerned about a flat spot on baby's head - freaked out and started buying a lot of products to reposition baby to fight the flat spot. We used this for a few weeks when he was around 3 months - always supervised - in a swing or car seat. I don't think it helped. I'm not sure if it would have worked earlier, but starting at 3 months was just too late. If I had it to do over, this product would be a pass for me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go into the car seat for one we got ready to bring our newborn home. He needed something that was going to make his head more sturdy on the short ride home and the car seat didn't come with one. This works perfectly for that purpose in general. He only needed it for about three weeks and then he was big enough to kind of be more sturdy on his own so we only needed it temporarily. Other than that I would definitely recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL WITH THIS PILLOW - DENT IN BABY'S HEAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW AFTER USING FOR TWO WEEKS: After using this pillow for two weeks, we noticed a dent in my baby's head because of how this pillow's designed. I saw other review mentioned this too but i chose to ignore it because there were so many five stars review. So learn from my mistake and read other reviews before you buy it! Now i know why pediatrician does not recommend any pillow, and the best way is to let your baby sleep on different sides. I still think you can let the baby sleep on it OCCASIONALLY when she sleeps on the back, but switching sides is the best way to prevent flat head!!
customer_reviews.author: BinBin

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Only a week!
customer_reviews.text: Wow... these before/after pictures are only a week apart. (Just ignore his upcoming Joe Dirt haircut, lol). I started feeding him this morning, & noticed the back of his head feeling more round! So I just took this “after” photo this morning. Btw, this is my first amazon review ever. That’s how much I appreciate this product. I actually bought 2...one for home & the other for travel/grandparents (baby sitting). You can place this in a bouncer, baby swing, car seat, etc... someone purchased me a different flat-head pillow weeks ago, but it was too firm to use in bouncers/swings/car seats. This one here, is just perfect. Definitely buy it!! It’s amazing 😄
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as I prefer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this noggin nest to help with my babies flat spot from laying on the same side (she prefers the right side!). I was thinking this would be super comfy and pillowy but that wasn't really the case. This item is a little like muslin feeling but even more dense and there is really no "give" in the pillow area. I really wanted something for my LO to be able to have in her crib but I just don't trust this and the comfort is a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest design
customer_reviews.text: Wish the back area was a little more padded. Before my baby got bigger this made her head push way forward and crunch her chin into her neck. Now that she’s older it’s not an issue but she also doesn’t really need the pillow now that it’s more comfortable. So it was kind of useless for preventing flat head early on. I guess you could fold up a receiving blanket or something to even it out a bit more like other reviews have stated but that made her hot in her carseat so it didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon_Roll

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I made the first purchase of this bobby noggin for my son - 5 years ago - and I purchased another one for my newborn because I love these so much. They are so soft but firm to support the baby's head and it helps to prevent flat head. I still have my son's old bobby noggin and will use it in addition to this new one I bought because they are durable and long lasting. Definitely don't hesitate in purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: RUUBZ

customer_reviews.title: Helps my torticollis baby!
customer_reviews.text: My child has torticollis so I bought this to help with supporting her head while in her mamaroo. That being said, I LOVE the head part of this! But the bottom part is simply fabric and it gets all bunched up. There’s not much making it stay In place on a swing like the mamaroo. Nevertheless we will still be using it for the unforeseeable future and it’s helped with her to not favor one side of her head-like all torticollis babies do.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Flattens our with bigger head
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 2 month old twin daughters because I noticed their head were slightly going flat. This is a convenient and easy to use pillow. I use it when they’re just laying around, in a car seat or any other place they will be for long periods of time. The only issue I have with this is the bottom portion of the pillow went flat pretty quickly. If your baby has a bigger head this pillow probably won’t be good for you. It’s great for my daughter that has a slightly smaller head tho.
customer_reviews.author: jose guerra

customer_reviews.title: Fixed our sons flat spot! Saved us so much worry and money!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son had a flat head in the back from sleeping in his rock n play. This fit perfectly in the rock n play and his head has rounded out significantly and now the helmet thing the Dr told us would likely be a necessity is not needed anymore! Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Finney

customer_reviews.title: Once done with washing it, it can be used immediately. No chemical smells or anything
customer_reviews.text: I had seen a lot of FB commercials for infant pillows. Ordered 2, and they took months to be delivered. So I came to trusty Amazon and got this. My baby only uses this one!!! He sleeps in it without fuss and I have no problems of him rotating side to side. Should have only bought this and not waisted my money on the other ones
customer_reviews.author: Read

customer_reviews.title: I regret not buying this earlier
customer_reviews.text: My baby had flat spot on her back head because we took her out when she was a very new born and a car seat seemed to press her head much. After i found the flat spot, i bought Boppy Nest head support after seeing the reviews and I am satisfied with the use. It does not stop for the head being flat but it does not progress more.
customer_reviews.author: Kryskhloe

customer_reviews.title: Helped among other things
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son at 2 months old because his head was getting flat on one side. He is 4 months today and I think I might take it out of his crib now because he is starting to roll over and I think its in his way now and frustrates him so it makes him not want to sleep in his crib. His head is rounding out now so I think it helped along with more tummy time and sitting up more.
customer_reviews.author: B Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Cute and super functional
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is perfect. Wish I didn’t hesitate to buy before my baby came. She’s 1 month now and I just decided to buy it after noticing her head would slouch to one side in swing and car seat and it’s perfect! Plus the design is so cute. Ordering another one now so I don’t have to move from swing to car seat every time I need it. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: May B.

customer_reviews.title: Rounded out baby’s flat spots in a week’s time!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different, higher-priced pillow without success. My 7-week old baby likes to turn his head to one side when he sleeps, and that first pillow didn’t do a thing for him (then 5-6 weeks). Then this Boppy pillow was recommended by my baby’s pediatrician. Glad to say it worked its magic in a week’s time! I think it also makes him feels more secure.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I washed this product before using it as I do with everything that comes in contact with my baby. It washed nicely and looked just like it did when it came. It dried nicely also. It fits perfect in everything, her swing, her bouncy seat and her stroller. I was getting concerned about her having a flat head so I needed something to prevent that and so far I’m loving it
customer_reviews.author: mz.downs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: My baby spends a lot of time in his swing and I didn’t want his head getting flat. I ordered this and it fits in the graco duet swing perfectly. I think it will help keep his head round and I think he is even more comfortable. But sure not to add this to a car seat as it is unsafe to add anything to a car seat that didn’t come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had bought this to support the baby's head and to encourage the proper shaping of his head. Unfortunately, the product allows for the baby's head to dip to a side and has now resulted in a flatter side than the rest. Not pleased at all and will have to find a better product to allow for the proper shaping of his head.
customer_reviews.author: rajaghose

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't use for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Okay head support. I had this on my registry, but after only using it a few times it didn't really seem to help keep my newborns head from flopping side to side. i had to go buy a different thicker and bigger one. I'm thinking this will work when she capable of holding her neck up and I can use on her stroller seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this. I put our baby on it when he’s just laying on the floor playing. He seems totally comfortable also. Holds the head in the perfect position without falling off. I place it under bassinet sheet when we do nap time but I am still right with him ofcourse and it always stays in place
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great baby pillow! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent baby pillow to keep your little one’s head supported and round! My husband and I were starting to worry about our baby getting flat spots and so we bought this. I feel like my baby sleeps better with this and it has solved the problem of him favoring one side of his head when in his car seat. Better to be proactive and prevent flat spots than have to deal with medical issues later!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Mack

customer_reviews.title: I guess it's working
customer_reviews.text: Our kid has been a righteous sleeper since birth and I guess laying down more than most newborns made his little head flat. There has definitely been a marked change since we use this. We use it every time he's laying down, with the exception of night sleep (which has been 8-10 hours since month 3). One star removed: the velcro that attaches near the slits seems like it's not aligned properly and won't always stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: cheluzal

customer_reviews.title: Supports baby well
customer_reviews.text: This head support provides the needed support for my baby while she is in her swing. She will watch me cook dinner now since her head is supported well. The material is easy to clean and does not stain easily. I love when I find a product that cleans well after a baby spit up!
customer_reviews.author: HaileyJ

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you need it
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these as a gift. If you have a mamaro and your child send to not like it, I recommend putting this in it. This had our baby loving our mamaro, or swing, and laying on the ground. We came in here and bought another one so we don't have to keep switching between machines!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It works!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So much love for this product! It has done wonders for my little one's head. I was skeptical at first, but was willing to try anything, so I bought it based on the reviews. It did not take long to start working and my infant seems to like it. its soft enough for comfort but firm enough for the support. Also super easy to clean, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: DevDev

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not sure if it helps flat head
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with my baby’s slight flat head spot. I’ve had it for a couple weeks now, not sure if it actually works but it’s very supportive. I only use it when baby naps and I am monitoring him. Never use when baby is sleeping and unmonitored as it can increase risk of SIDS. Overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Rounded his head!
customer_reviews.text: Helped round my babies head. I only used at night and in his stroller, it looked a bit uncomfortable in his car seat but it ROUNDED his head!! The doctor referred my 3month old to get a helmet, I got this to avoid the helmet and it seriously worked! Plus it was great as a head support for sleep time in the bassinet and use in the stroller to avoid him falling to the side. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from needing a helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I am kicking myself for not taking a before picture, but this product is amazing. Our fourth month old had a very flat spot on his head (we were referred to a craniologist) and we were so nervous about a helmet! We ordered the noggin' nest as a last resort while we waited to get on the schedule and within two weeks his head was significantly more round! The only negative about this product is it does cause head sweat and it gets VERY stinky. However, its easy to wash so it really isnt a problem for us. I would recommend this to anyone dealing with a flat spot!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Warren

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. I regret not buying it sooner.. we bought it when my baby was about 2-3 months because he started developing flat spot on the side. Ended up needing a doc band anyway. Probably if we had gotten it sooner it might’ve helped more. We did see improvement on his position.
customer_reviews.author: Iza

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This headrest is a Godsend. It keeps your baby’s head round when they have to lay on their back. I’ve used it on all 3 of my kids and I can’t stress enough how much this has helped. I give one to every friend as a baby shower gift. If you’re on the fence, this is SO worth it. Especially if it saves you the money, time, stress, etc. of having to have your child wear a helmet to reshape their head. Please please please buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: No results for 4 months unsteady my baby lost his hair in one spot where the open is
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 4 months and I didn’t see any results. Is like one of the reviews said that little open area caused the baby to loose his hair and become one spot of bold. In The picture i submitted is after I stop using it for 1 month you can see his hair is coming back I m not recommended it because of my experience
customer_reviews.author: saoudat hamada

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m just impressed how easily she took to it. She never sleeps flat! She favors the right and was starting to develop a flat spot. I was worried she wouldnt transition well to a pillow but she did right away and her head hasn’t tilted yet. I’m excited! I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t atest to the durability but I have no doubts. Yes, that’s a rock n play and no, it doesn’t slide out of place.
customer_reviews.author: HaKrueg

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite pillow
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of reviews talk about there becoming a indentation from the pillow but that has not been the case for us. We use the pillow only at night. And sometimes we use it every other night. Also I haven’t noticed any of her hair falling out on the pillow which was a concern but quickly disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi B

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for his car seat
customer_reviews.text: We live in florida and it's INSANELY HOT. I didn't like my babys head flopping around in the car seat but it was hard to find a head support that wasn't too hot. This fabric is nice and cool &seems to do the trick! I love that its easy to Velcro in and out and also protects him from flat head. :)!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product, met ALL expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! My baby has RSV at 7 weeks old and developed a flat head from being intubated, sedated, and a picc line so she couldn't be moved/held up for 3 weeks. We bought this and her bones are still soft enough in her head that this has reshaped her head and it's no longer flat. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lko

customer_reviews.title: Buy from day one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow that I recommend to purchase from the day the baby is born. I started using this pillow when my baby's head was already pretty flat, and although this pillow did help prevent any further flatness, I still had to get a band for his head. I'm sure if this pillow is used from the start, plagiocephaly can be prevented.
customer_reviews.author: kells

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby pillow by far. Love it and babes flat spots have improved so much!
customer_reviews.text: Around 3-4 months we were growing so so worried about our baby boys flat spot. This pillow has been a god send. It’s helped so much and I truly believe he is so comfortable on it! Love it! The back piece holds it in place and the Velcro parts make it easy to shift for comfort. We’ve tried several similar pillows this has been our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: KG21

customer_reviews.title: Messes up ears!! And makes flathead worse
customer_reviews.text: This pushed my child’s ears out permanently And caused a flat spot where his head falls through. This is dangerous!!! And now he needs ear splints. Don’t use!!!
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Our baby's physical therapist in the NICU recommended this product
customer_reviews.text: Our baby's physical therapist in the NICU recommended this product! I love it so far--it keeps him from throwing his head in awkward positions. The hospital approved it for his bed while he's in the NICU--we will continue to use this product when we get home. I plan on having it in his swing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: DachshundGirl

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy had Torticollis and we struggled with his head being flat because of it. This thing is awesome. I never leave reviews but to anyone thinking about buying this- do it. In addition to extra tummy time, this has been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Bookfan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in hopes to help my sons flat part round out. Let me tell you...IT WORKED! He loves laying on this and will even adjust his head so he finds his “spot” lol. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Katie gilkey

customer_reviews.title: Pillow keeps moving.
customer_reviews.text: Previous boppy pillow had padding all around, this one doesn't have padding under the neck area, so pillow keeps sliding up when baby moves his head. So the donut area doesn't stay where ita suppose to take off the pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Y Shah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow for a baby
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pillow for a baby. We used it in the early months every time our boy was laying down and it truly prevented the flat head syndrome. Baby is allowed to turn his head from side to side without having the nose and mouth close to the outer layer. It fit in the stroller, crib, pack and play, changing table etc. it washes and dries in the machine easily. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Loved our head donut
customer_reviews.text: I used this “head donut” for both of my daughters. Where ever I would set them down (obviously besides naps) I would set this under them and neither of them got flat heads. Highly recommend! Good baby shower present because it’s one of those things that you don’t realize you need until you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than I thought I would. Baby can turn their head and still look around (I thought it would keep them looking forward). I like that she can still look around but her head isnt flat. Fits well in bouncer, swing, on play gym, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ben D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use this for car seat and in swing. My son was getting flat head and his hair was falling out where his head rubbed in the car seat/swing. Once I started using it, his head is no longer flat and his hair grew back.
customer_reviews.author: george a.

customer_reviews.title: Newborn must have!
customer_reviews.text: I had this neck head pillow for my daughter 3 years ago when she born. That help prevent flat head and I placed in her infant car seat for support, I purchased again for my nephew that just born. I recommended this product to new parents
customer_reviews.author: Ivy A.

customer_reviews.title: May work better for younger babies
customer_reviews.text: It tilts my 12 week old babys head too forward when I used it in Her swing, and she scoots right off of it in her play area. I dont use it for sleep due to the risk factor but she has started moving in her sleep a lot anyways so it wouldnt make a difference. I can see it being better for a stroller. Its not considered safe for a carseat so I wouldnt try that either.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Damare

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this while pregnant figuring it would come in handy and it has. We use it in his bassinet stroller for walks and also for support while on his play mats. He is getting a flat spot from sleeping on his back due to safe sleep practices but during playtime we use this so his head gets support.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: helped make baby's head... desi style
customer_reviews.text: for all the desi indo pak people who are obsessed with baby head forming or are pressurized into it due to constant inquiries from concerned family members who think they know what's best for YOUR baby , then this product is just the right fit for you and your baby's head :P
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought earlier
customer_reviews.text: My baby started to get a flat head despite hours of tummy time. From other reviews I’m thinking it was from rock and play. I put this in the rock and play and we saw dramatic improvement in days
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Keeps my baby facing up so I dont have to worry about her going onto her side cause she gets wiggly sometimes..and is good support for her head and helps with keeping her head round not flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Decent head support for little ones
customer_reviews.text: Still using this insert, and I really think it has contributed helping my baby's flat spot round out over time. Of course, it's not a cure-all. A baby still needs lots of tummy time, but it's been a life saver on harder surfaces that cannot be avoided. I don't worry as much putting my little one in his seat while I get some dishes done or fold laundry. It only gets 4 stars because of how easy it moves out of place when picking up or putting down my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Cryhavoc42

customer_reviews.title: Dents baby’s head
customer_reviews.text: It works holding up baby’s head but dang it just like other reviewers said it left a dent on back of baby’s head. We just noticed it yesterday so we’re going to stop using it. Hopefully the dent comes out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Roth

customer_reviews.title: Prevents Need for a Helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: My first baby needed a helmet. The 2nd baby started getting a flat head so we put this in the car seat at 1 month of age and it worked! My son has a perfectly round head!! (We also saw a chiropractor to work on neck movement.)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: So initially pulling this out of the package I was like, "this is REALLY SMALL". My two month old baby is longer than the entire product, however, this pillow does WONDERS. My baby's head was noticeably flat on the left side only and overnight you could tell it was getting better. Within a week it was not flat anymore! We still continue to use it and send it to daycare for them to use as well. BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked super well!! We were on the border of having to get a helmet which I was not looking forward to. Keep in mind it left a little dent in the back of her head from the hole, but it went away, and helped her head shape out. Plus for the price it’s worth trying it out!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: I love the head support!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to a small flat spot on my little one. He has a side preference and this head support has helped with keeping his head straight. Not only that, but when he does manage to turn his head, it gives it support and relieve the weight on one side. I use this on his swing and also while in the car seat. I'm ordering a second one so that I don't have to be switching back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Mer. M. Del Cid

customer_reviews.title: Must still pay attention to babies head.
customer_reviews.text: After reviews we decided to give this a try as our little one loves being in his swing, playing on his play mat and sleeps in a rock n play...all activities that don’t cradle his head. We put it in is swing and noticed within a couple weeks his head was starting to take the shape of the hole....as soon as we realized that we stopped using it and thankfully that has gone away. Although it seemed helpful, be carful to not over use it and pay attention to your babies head after they have been using it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: They make my twins too hot, discontinued use.
customer_reviews.text: We have twin girls(4m) and these were reccommend by PT. The overall design is good, no complaints with that. Easy to clean. What I DON'T like is the material it's made of. My twin girls get so hot so we have stopped using them. It seems dangerous for this reason. I should have spent the money on a similar product that is cotton and breathable. We did gut it out for a couple weeks and I did not see any change in head shape.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Worked well; fit well
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what was needed. The baby it was bought for only had a slight flattened spot, so it worked well. It was bought to go into the infant carrier.
customer_reviews.author: E Fink

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this everyday with my LO but use it pretty often. She doesn’t seem uncomfortable with it. I’ve already washed it a few times and it’s still the same way as when I purchased it. Also like the storage bag it comes with. I have seen a little bit of a difference with her head but like I said I don’t use it every single day. If used more frequently I would expect more of a change but my LO is now holding her head more unsupported so it’s not as needed as before. Wish I had gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: HippieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the early weeks with baby before they have head control. We use in baby's recliner and vibrating chair to keep her head neutral. Never use overnight or out of sight. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ActiveReader

customer_reviews.title: it's not really working for my baby boy
customer_reviews.text: I read so many good reviews about this pillow and decided to buy one for my son, but my baby boy's head never really sleeps right on the hole. Maybe it's not a pillow for side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My sons head took to the form of the small circle. Flat all around and bulging in the middle. I don’t recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Prevent flat head!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to late. I wish I had them earlier! I am getting helmets for my twins and believe we may have been able to avoid it with this product used from birth. I didn't purchase until they were 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Melziepie

customer_reviews.title: We got it for his flat head
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our little man for his swing and he’s comfortable in it! He has flat head so I didn’t want to put him on the swing any more and this gives me more comfort knowing it’s helping him! Hopefully I give an update if it’s fixing his flat head! Easy to wash as well
customer_reviews.author: Pedro D Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with my daughter's flatness. I purchased this product based on others reviews and am very pleased with it. It has helped her tremendously. We use it in her carseat and swing, sometimes even on the floor. Very great product and super cute pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene

customer_reviews.title: No flat head yet
customer_reviews.text: Baby is 3 weeks old and I use this product for her swing and a different product in her bassinet and she doesn’t have flat yet. Super happy with it I think it’s well priced too
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Material of product made my daughter's head sweat instantly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Material of product made my daughter's head sweat instantly and then began to smell. Even after washing it still had an unpleasant odor.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bald baby vs flat head baby
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this because my baby had a little bit of a flat head. After two days however she got a bald line across the back of her head where the cushion sits. So I don’t think it was as great as I thought in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee Ray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I found a head support pillow to help with plagiocephaly. I wish the middle support section was a bit more plush but by far the bet product I have seen for this purpose thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Boppy Noggin Nest Head Support, Gray Elephants, Head Support for Infants
product_meta.description: Color:Mint ElephantToday's babies spend more time on their backs, yet young infants cannot hold up their heavy little noggins. So, until he can do it himself, help him relieve the pressure by elevating and cradling his head in comfy support with the unique, patented cut-out design of the Bopp Noggin Nest Head Support. Use it when baby is on-the-go in the stroller, relaxing in the swing and bouncing in the bouncer. The generous padding in a fashionable print cradles baby's head to provide all-over comfort. Tumble dry on low.
feature_bullets: UNIQUE CUT-OUT DESIGN: The Boppy Noggin Nest Head Support has a unique, patented cut-out. Designed to relieve pressure while keeping your baby's head safely cradled. The product is endorsed by a Pediatrician.

MULTI-FUNCTION: Works with a 3- and 5-point harness system and is simple to install in any stroller, bouncer, or swing. Remove existing padded infant inserts before use. The head support should only be used in the recline position for infants.
EASY CARE, MACHINE WASHABLE: The head support is machine washable for easy care because little messes happen. Do not use in crib, cradle, bassinet, playpen, play yard or bed
0 TO 4 MONTHS: Recommended use for babies 0 to 4 months old.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,147 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
